a 72-year-old presidential candidate, would you go to your 50th college reunion 6 weeks before election day? a new Barack Obama campaign ad says John McCain supports "cutting social security benefits in half." factcheck.org says that's a falsehood sure to frighten seniors who rely on their social security checks. in truth, John McCain does not propose to cut those checks at all. also, a fact check we pointed to yesterday needs to be corrected.
